title: India saw ninefold increase in EV charging stations in last two years but why it isn't enough
description: India's public electric vehicle charging stations multiplied significantly from 1,800 in February 2022 to 16,347 by March 2024. However, with 50 million EVs expected by 2030, about 1.32 million chargers will be needed, necessitating 400,000 annual installations. Government initiatives and industry efforts are crucial to meet this growing demand.
